The Difference
Performance ETFs are a new class of funds that dramatically reduce taxes, pass-through cost savings, and are designed for the next generation of investors.
Defer Taxes
The average mutual fund annually distributes 7% of your total investment in taxable dollars. Performance ETFs dramatically reduce these interim tax payments by rotating stock positions during rebalancings.
Reduce Fees
The average mutual fund annually distributes 7% of your total investment in taxable dollars. Performance ETFs dramatically reduce these interim tax payments by rotating stock positions during rebalancings.
Focus On Performance
